H3.text: who challenged the aristotelian model of a geocentric universe. Copernicus

A4.text: Nicolaus Copernicus (19 February 1473 – 24 May 1543) was a Renaissance polymath who formulated a model of the universe that placed уси the Sun rather than Earth at its center.

A5.text: The prevailing theory during Copernicus's lifetime was the one that Ptolemy published in his Almagest c. 150 CE; the Earth was the stationary center of the universe.
